Sawasdee Kha,
I am Thai-American and I am fluent in the language.  I was born in L.A.

As for doujinshi the moderators here will answer your questions---we do have 
yaoi fans here.

If you can give me the webaddresses of Thai online bookstores which sell 
Shinsengumi manga I would really appreciate it.  I can translate from Thai 
to English very well and I would love to share some scanlations to our 
little group.

For example, the later volumes of Kaze Hikaru, Burai, Peacemaker Kurogane.
I have access to a great scanner at school so if I get the manga it would be 
pretty easy for me.

Also I strongly believe that the novel Mibugishiden (which became the movie 
When the Last Sword is Drawn) is in Thai because as you know there is a HUGE 
market for martial arts novels in Thailand.  If you don't already know, 
Mibugishiden is about...SAITOU HAJIME!  (^_^).  I'm not sure if Thailand has 
purchased Mibugishiden yet for VCD distribution.

Yin dee tee dai ruu jak na kha,

secretarytocapt3(a)hotmail.com
http://www.shinsengumihq.com
